title: Neon Noir Detective Office Adventure #43
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Rain-Soaked Detective Office
rooms.description: A cramped office on the 43rd floor. Rain streaks down the window, distorting the neon signs outside. Your desk is cluttered with case files and empty coffee cups. A holographic display flickers in the corner. The air smells of cigarette smoke and cheap whiskey.

items.name: detective's desk
items.description: A battered wooden desk covered in papers and old tech

items.name: case file alpha
items.description: A manila folder marked 'CASE #0847 - CONFIDENTIAL'
items.text: CASE #0847: The Neon Dragon Syndicate. Primary suspect: Victor Zhao. Last seen at the Nexus Club in the Downtown Sector. Evidence stored in locker 7. Detective badge required for evidence room access.

items.name: metal filing cabinet
items.description: A dented filing cabinet with four drawers

items.name: witness statement
items.description: A typed statement from a witness
items.text: Witness Report: I saw the suspect enter the Nexus Club around midnight. He was carrying a briefcase. The club is in the Downtown Sector. I heard him mention something about 'locker 7' to his associate. - Anonymous Witness #007

items.name: small brass key
items.description: A key labeled 'Evidence Locker 7'

items.name: detective's keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with your detective badge number

items.name: holographic terminal
items.description: A flickering holographic display showing city surveillance feeds
items.text: SURVEILLANCE LOG: Victor Zhao spotted entering Nexus Club, Downtown Sector. Subject is armed and dangerous. Approach with caution. Your detective ID: Detective Morgan Cross.

items.name: old coat rack
items.description: A wooden coat rack with a trench coat hanging on it

items.name: personal notes
items.description: Your handwritten notes on the case
items.text: Notes: Victor Zhao - leader of Neon Dragon Syndicate. Operates out of Downtown Sector. Must gather evidence from locker 7 before confronting him. Remember: I'm Detective Morgan Cross, badge #0847.

items.name: reinforced office door
items.description: A heavy door with a card reader leading to the evidence room

rooms.name: Evidence Storage Room
rooms.description: A sterile room lined with numbered lockers. Fluorescent lights hum overhead. Security cameras watch from every corner. The air is cold and smells of disinfectant. A large vault door dominates the far wall, leading to the high-security area.

items.name: evidence locker 7
items.description: A metal locker with a brass keyhole

items.name: encrypted datapad
items.description: A digital tablet with encrypted files
items.text: DECRYPTED FILES: Victor Zhao's operations center is in the Downtown Sector. His syndicate meets at the Nexus Club. To access the high-security vault, you must verify your identity and case details.

items.name: surveillance photograph
items.description: A grainy photo of Victor Zhao
items.text: Photo shows Victor Zhao entering a building in the Downtown Sector. Timestamp: 23:47. Location confirmed: Nexus Club.

items.name: security terminal
items.description: A computer terminal with access logs
items.text: SECURITY LOG: Evidence collected for Case #0847. Detective Morgan Cross authorized. Suspect location: Downtown Sector, Nexus Club. Proceed to high-security vault for final evidence.

items.name: metal storage shelves
items.description: Shelves filled with evidence boxes and files

items.name: case summary report
items.description: A comprehensive summary of the investigation
items.text: CASE SUMMARY: Detective Morgan Cross investigating Case #0847. Suspect Victor Zhao operates from the Nexus Club in Downtown Sector. All evidence points to syndicate headquarters at this location.

items.name: high_security vault door
items.description: A massive steel door with a biometric scanner and question panel

password_questions.question: What is your detective name?
password_questions.hint: Check your personal notes and the holographic display

password_questions.question: Where does Victor Zhao operate?
password_questions.hint: Multiple files mention the suspect's location

password_questions.question: What is the suspect's base of operations?
password_questions.hint: The case file and surveillance data reveal this

rooms.name: Nexus Club - Syndicate Headquarters
rooms.description: You've infiltrated the Neon Dragon Syndicate's headquarters! The room pulses with holographic displays and neon lights. Victor Zhao's empty desk sits in the center, surrounded by evidence of his criminal empire. A emergency exit glows green on the far wall - your escape route after gathering the final evidence.

items.name: Victor Zhao's desk
items.description: A sleek desk covered in holographic projectors and data chips

items.name: syndicate records
items.description: Digital files containing all the evidence needed to bring down the Neon Dragon Syndicate

items.name: holographic city map
items.description: A 3D map showing the syndicate's operations across the city
items.text: The map reveals the full extent of Victor Zhao's criminal network. With this evidence, you can finally close Case #0847.

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've gathered all the evidence needed to bring down the Neon Dragon Syndicate. Victor Zhao's empire crumbles as you transmit the data to headquarters. The rain-soaked streets of the neon city are a little safer tonight. Case #0847: CLOSED. You win, Detective!
